lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic is expecting a fierce battle with an old friend and familiar protagonist when he makes a bid for history in the Australian Open final against Andy Murray on Sunday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic is expecting a fierce battle with an old friend and familiar protagonist when he makes a bid for history in the Australian Open final against Andy Murray on Sunday....

headline.main: History Man Djokovic Expects Melbourne Dogfight With Murray
headline.print_headline: History Man Djokovic Expects Melbourne Dogfight With Murray
